description: With the record of 0-3 on NK, Paul Wagner is hungry for a win. He's counting on using what he's learned from his previous matches to dominate his opponent, Hayden Russo, and then show him "who's his daddy" with a good, hard fuck. This is Hayden's first time on NK and he's going to use his 4 years of boxing experience, and the fact that he's younger and quicker, to take down Paul and keep him there, while he fucks him into the mat and then cums all over his face. This week it's size vs speed. Can Paul finally win his first match on NK or will Hayden send the bear back into hibernation for good?
title: Paul Wagner vs Hayden Russo
